title: Carpet
description: large carpet with repeating tree of life and floral motifs in center field; seven borders; outer border is a repeating lozenge motif, six inner borders have floral and meander motifs.  A 5 x 2-1/2 foot section has been cut from the border of one side of the carpet (for fireplace hearth?)
creditline: Gift of the John S. Duss Memorial Music Conservatory
